good

Game is balanced. just some maps give survivors more advantages while others give to killer. So you can pick an offer to increase luck to choose your favorite map as a survivor or killer. Game need some experience to play right. It's easy to play in low ranks but as you rank up it's getting more competitive. Killer or survivor you can make great work both if you know how to play or choosing right perks. But i think if you are full team of friends as survivors and all experienced, playing as a killer is really hard. All of these good things i think. Only negative thing about game is bloodpoint system, point for level up and open your perks. Every survivor or killer has unique perks and some of these perks are really important so if you don't like a survivor character and don't want to play it still you have to rank up it with bloodpoints so you can use it's perk for an another character you play. Making bloodpoint is hard in this game and harder for survivors then a killer. So this causes grinding in game and people don't like grind. They should update bloodpoint system as soon as possible. I give 7/10 or 8/10 for Dead by Daylight.
Fun co-op horror game, definitely makes you work together for success. I wish there was an easier way to play as the monster in the same group as your friends, but overall still a good game!

SBMM has 100% destroyed this game.

Every game will be meta killers running meta addons running meta perks, or 4-man sweat SWF squads running meta perks and meta items/addons.

And if you manage through that, be prepared to get camped and tunneled 24/7.

Any resemblance of honor or skill has left this game a long time ago.  All that is left now is SBMM sweat.

사람들이 매일같이 다인큐 다인큐 이러면서 화를 내지만 내 생각에는 다인큐 자체가 나쁘지는 않다
 생존자를 하는 사람이라면 친구와 함께 즐기기 좋다
하지만 살인마를 주로 하는분이라면 스트레스가 이만 저만이 아니다 티배깅을 시작으로 티배깅으로 끝나는 유저 , 각종 버그 , 핵 등등 덕에 살인마를 주로 하는분들은 예민해져 있다는게 내 생각이다

나 또한 원래는 살인마를 주로 플레이 하였지만 
악질 플레이어들 덕에 살인마를 접고 가끔 지인이 게임하자 할때만 생존자를 하고 있다

Korku oyunları içerisinde en sevdiğim oyun Dead By Daylight. Oynaması ve arayüzü oldukça kolay. Türkçe dil desteği ile hiç zorluk çekmeyeceksiniz. Özellikle arkadaşlarınızla beraber oynuyorsanız oldukça keyifli saatler harcayacaksınız. Alın aldırtın kardeşim. Mis gibi oyun yapmış adamlar.
Jogo divertido d+ recomendo a todos, jogo no Xbox e vim pro Pc, e continua divertido
ICSDE

Jogo pay to win de 50 reais que precisa de compra in-game pra ter as habilidades mais fortes.

Ao jogar de madrugada, tive 8 partida, das 8, 4 tiveram killer afk, e 3 tiveram um sobrevivente trabalhando com o killer.

O sistema de habilidades faz com que você tenha habilidades relacionadas a certos personagens, e pra liberar as habilidades dele pra outros, você tem de chegar no nível máximo com ele.

Não seria um problema, se os personagens mais fortes não fossem compráveis apenas com dinheiro real, então ou tu gasta mais 30 reais pra liberar 3 killers.

O sistema de level-up é quebrado, aonde tu recebe XP mais por participar do que por ir bem, resultado? Partidas e partidas com gente afk, parado atacando o ar, ou escondido em armário pra receber XP fácil. Denunciei todos que encontrei e ainda não obtive resposta.
